Class SldAbandonedStation

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAbandonedStation
public final class SldAbandonedStation extends SldAdvCard
Represents the sealed advanced card "Abandoned Station".

This card offers players a choice: lose a certain number of days and in return receive a predefined set of goods. Only players with a minimum number of crew can activate its effect. Once a player chooses to apply the effect, the card transitions to a placement state for rewards.

  • Constructor Details

    • SldAbandonedStation

      public SldAbandonedStation(int id, int level, int daysLost, int crewNeeded, List<GoodType> goods)
      Constructs an Abandoned Station card with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the card
      level - the difficulty or tier level of the card
      daysLost - number of days a player loses if the effect is applied
      crewNeeded - number of crew members required to activate the effect
      goods - the list of goods rewarded upon applying the effect

  • Method Details

    • loadAbandonedStation

      public static SldAbandonedStation loadAbandonedStation(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Loads an SldAbandonedStation object from a JSON node. This static method parses the provided JsonNode to extract the necessary attributes (id, level, daysLost, crewNeeded, and a list of goods) and constructs a new SldAbandonedStation instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the data for the abandoned station.
      Returns:
      A new SldAbandonedStation instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(Player player, boolean wantsToApply)
      Applies the card effect for the given player, if they accept.

      The player loses days, and the game pushes an event to allow goods placement.

      Parameters:
      player - the player activating the card
      wantsToApply - true if the player agrees to apply the effect
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the card is not in an appropriate state
